name: Heroku nginx reverse proxy
description: A sample nginx app that acts as reverse proxy for other Heroku apps

NGINX_UPSTREAM_DOMAINNAME_1.description: upstream domain name 1 e.g. ab-ps-gettingstartedjava-acm.herokuapp.com without http/https protocol

NGINX_UPSTREAM_DOMAINNAME_2.description: upstream domain name 2 e.g. ab-ps-gettingstartedjava-acm.herokuapp.com without http/https protocol

NGINX_UPSTREAM_DOMAINNAME_3.description: upstream domain name 3 e.g. ab-ps-gettingstartedjava-acm.herokuapp.com without http/https protocol

NGINX_UPSTREAM_PATH_1.description: upstream path, it's combined with the NGINX_UPSTREAM_DOMAINNAME_1 e.g. / or /app1/ that combined is heroku.com/app1/

NGINX_UPSTREAM_PATH_2.description: upstream path, it's combined with the NGINX_UPSTREAM_DOMAINNAME_1 e.g. / or /app1/ that combined is heroku.com/app1/

NGINX_UPSTREAM_PATH_3.description: upstream path, it's combined with the NGINX_UPSTREAM_DOMAINNAME_1 e.g. / or /app1/ that combined is heroku.com/app1/
